subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Bill Parcells traded the Miami Dolphins’ best player, defensive end Jason Taylor, to the Washington Redskins on Sunday for a second-round pick in 2009 and a sixth-rounder in 2010.
snippet: Bill Parcells traded the Miami Dolphins’ best player, defensive end Jason Taylor, to the Washington Redskins on Sunday for a second-round pick in 2009 and a sixth-rounder in 2010.
